meanings.definition: A unit of pressure equal to one millionth of a bar.
meanings.sent1: Scientists measure atmospheric pressure in microbars.
meanings.sent2: The instrument detected a reading of 10 microbars.
meanings.sent3: I tried to lift the heavy weight, but it felt like a million microbars on my shoulders!
meanings.sent4: The tension in the room was so high, it felt like a million microbars pressing down on us.
meanings.sent5: The tiny insect could sense even the slightest change in microbars around it.
